content:
Several quick start options are available:

  • Download the latest release.
  • Clone the repo: git clone https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap.git
  • Install with npm: npm install bootstrap@4.0.0-beta.3
  • Install with yarn: yarn add bootstrap@4.0.0-beta.3
  • Install with Composer: composer require twbs/bootstrap:4.0.0-beta.3
  • Install with NuGet: CSS: Install-Package bootstrap -Pre Sass: Install-Package bootstrap.sass -Pre (-Pre is only required until Bootstrap v4 has a stable release).

Read the Getting started page for information on the framework contents, templates and examples, and more.
